title: Ticket #3264: Remove safefile configure script
description:
It drives me nuts to have the safefile configure script each time I run cmake - it takes much longer to run that script than the rest of cmake.

Digging in, it appears this is only used to fill in a single variable in a single file. Patch incoming.

check_ins: 2012-Oct-10 20:48   Check-in [33652]: Remove safefile configure script - replace with a few magic lines of cmake. #3264 Do not apply on Windows. (By Brian Bockelman )
